31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_PATHNAME_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_PATHNAME_H_
33
34#ifdef _KERNEL
35
36#include <sys/param.h>
37#include <sys/vnode.h>
38
39typedef struct pathname {
40 char *pn_buf; /* underlying storage */
41 char *pn_path; /* remaining pathname */
42 size_t pn_pathlen; /* remaining length */
43 size_t pn_bufsize; /* total size of pn_buf */
44} pathname_t;
45
46#define NO_FOLLOW NOFOLLOW
47
48int lookupname(char *, enum uio_seg, enum symfollow, vnode_t **, vnode_t **);
49
50#endif /* _KERNEL */
51
52#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_PATHNAME_H_ */
53
